title: Crisps, Nuts And Snacks SFX Pack
description: You will get different types of crisps, nuts and drinks, popcorn, chocolate, granola bar, wafer, rice cake, biscuit, cereal, breadsticks, oat meal and crispbread.
longDescription:
Crisps, Nuts and Snacks brings 106 files of full flavor to your game or movie night…


You will get different types of crisps, nuts and drinks, popcorn, chocolate, granola bar, wafer, rice cake, biscuit, cereal, breadsticks, oat meal and crispbread.


This fun pack has many eating, drinking, packaging sounds such as tearing, shaking, rustling, opening/closing, and pouring.


These meticulously recorded sounds have clarity and room for further sound design with the flexible texture of the sounds for further customization. And you get the usual Vadi Sound craft and attention to detail!


Crisps, Nuts and Snacks is fit for all your delicious but not-so-healthy sound effect needs ^^ Recorded on our favorite Neumann KM184 mic.


Keywords including Style, Action, Texture
